オプション1: The next day, Star Man went with the children to the beach where coconut trees grew.

Star Man looked to see if there was an island beyond the sea.
But on the horizon there was only sky and sea—nothing else.
"I'll walk clockwise around the island and see if there's an island beyond the sea."
Parting with the children, Star Man walked counterclockwise along the shore.

Because the island was largely mountainous, to see beyond the sea he had to either go up to the summit,
or walk all the way around the coast.
